name: funkin-script-autocompleter
description: AutoCompleter for Friday Night Funkin` scripts

funkinscriptautocomplete.engine.description:
Which Friday Night Funkin' Engine Lua Script API will this extension autocomplete.
Requires Restart/Reload to take effect.

funkinscriptautocomplete.data.description: Path to the folder containing all the descriptions for the different engines.

funkinscriptautocomplete.enableOnlyOnCer.description: If checked, this extension will only work if a script contains '---@funkinScript' comment

funkinscriptautocomplete.functionArgsGen.description: If unchecked, after entering a function placeholder arguments aren't prefixed to events
